author: rwaldhoff
msg: * confirm that protocol, host and port have not changed before redirecting (previously would ignore host/port altogether, causing a request for the wrong document whenever redirected from host to host.)
* pay attention to query strings in redirects (previously quietly ignored)
Also adding getQueryString method, which was ommitted by oversight

author: rwaldhoff
msg: adding toExternalForm to Header (to mirror Cookie)
